body_html:
Is this diff absolutely necessary atm? The are several PRs in flight that touch actively affected files:

  • @jerryzh168's tensor/storage split
  • @orionr work on build unification which adds annotations to multiple functions and every rebase is really painful

Maybe minimize the blast-renames for now until unified build lands?
body:
Is this diff absolutely necessary atm? The are several PRs in flight that touch actively affected files:
- @jerryzh168's tensor/storage split
- @orionr work on build unification which adds annotations to multiple functions and every rebase is really painful

Maybe minimize the blast-renames for now until unified build lands?
